name: Solitaire 2G Double Pro
description:
No advertisement version!

2 themes: Classic and Christmas!

This is a solitaire game that uses two decks of cards.

This is a little different from the classic solitaire, no need to rack your brain, enjoy it and you're going to love it.

* How to Play *

Tap or drag cards to arrange them in descending order with alternating colors.
Move cards up to the foundation to sort all of the suits from Ace to King.
You can draw one card at a time for a more relaxing game, or draw three for a challenge to train your brain!

* Features *

- 4 leaderboards for world ranking
- Unlimited undo and hints
- Landscape and Portrait orientation support for iPad
- Auto complete
- Statistics
- Ranking for Winning Streak
- 30+ patterns for poker backside
- 3 patterns for poker face
